import React, { useEffect, useLayoutEffect } from "react"; import X_Icon_DarkBlue from '../../images/svg/X-Icon-DarkBlue.svg'; import Checkmark from '../../images/svg/Checkmark.svg'; const CreateCustomer = () => { return (
